detectors.description:
UniReward.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#708-723) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#714)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#717)
detectors.markdown:
[UniReward.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#L708-L723) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#L714)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#L717)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in UniReward.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#694-697):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#695)
		- bpt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#625)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#556)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#556)
		- yfi.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#703)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#647)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#646)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#702)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#649)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#696)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniReward.sol#650)
